Label: In one of the 100 largest metro areas
Description: This variable is equal to 1 if the census tract is located in one of the 100 largest metro areas (as of 2015), zero if located in a metro- or micropolitan area that does not belong to the 100 largest metro areas, and blank if it is located outside a metro- or micropolitan area.

Label: Number of children aged 0-17, ACS (2008-12 for 2010, 2013-17 for 2015)
Advanced Placement course enrollment
Description: Ratio of students enrolled in at least one AP course to the number of 11th and 12th graders, transformed to z-scores.

Label: Adult educational attainment
Description: Percentage adults ages 25 and over with a college degree or higher, transformed to z-scores.

Label: College enrollment in nearby institutions
Description: Percentage 18-24 year-olds enrolled in college within 25-mile radius, transformed to z-scores.

Label: Early childhood education enrollment
Description: Percentage 3- and 4-year-olds enrolled in nursery school, preschool or kindergarten, transformed to z-scores.

Label: High school graduation rate
Description: Percentage ninth graders graduating from high school on time, transformed to z-scores.

Label: Third grade math proficiency
Description: Percentage third graders scoring proficient on standardized math tests, converted to NAEP scale score points, transformed to z-scores.

Label: Third grade reading proficiency
Description: Percentage third graders scoring proficient on standardized reading tests, converted to NAEP scale score points, transformed to z-scores.

Label: School poverty
Description: Percentage students in elementary schools eligible for free or reduced-price lunches, transformed to z-scores and multiplied by -1.

Label: Teacher experience
Description: Percentage teachers in their first and second year, transformed to z-scores and multiplied by -1.

Label: Early childhood education centers
Description: Number of ECE centers within a 5-mile radius, converted to natural log units, transformed to z-scores.

Label: High-quality early childhood education centers
Description: Number of NAEYC accredited centers within a 5-mile radius, converted to natural log units, transformed to z-scores.

Label: Access to healthy food
Description: Percentage households without a car located further than a half-mile from the nearest supermarket, transformed to z-scores and multiplied by -1.

Label: Access to green space
Description: Percentage impenetrable surface areas such as rooftops, roads or parking lots, transformed to z-scores and multiplied by -1.

Label: Extreme heat exposure
Description: Summer days with maximum temperature above 90F, transformed to z-scores and multiplied by -1.

Label: Health insurance coverage
Description: Percentage individuals ages 0-64 with health insurance coverage, transformed to z-scores.

Label: Ozone concentration
Description: Mean estimated 8-hour average ozone concentration, transformed to z-scores and multiplied by -1.

Label: Airborne microparticles
Description: Mean estimated microparticle (PM2.5) concentration, transformed to z-scores and multiplied by -1.

Label: Housing vacancy rate
Description: Percentage housing units that are vacant, transformed to z-scores and multiplied by -1.

Label: Walkability
Description: EPA Walkability Index, transformed to z-scores.

Label: Hazardous waste dump sites
Description: Average number of Superfund sites within a 2-mile radius, converted to natural log units, transformed to z-scores and multiplied by -1.

Label: Industrial pollutants in air, water or soil
Description: Index of toxic chemicals released by industrial facilities, converted to natural log units, transformed to z-scores and multiplied by -1.

Label: Employment rate
Description: Percentage adults ages 25-54 who are employed, transformed to z-scores.

Label: Commute duration
Description: Percentage workers commuting more than one hour one way, transformed to z-scores and multiplied by -1.

Label: Single-headed households
Description: Percentage family households that are single-parent headed, transformed to z-scores and multiplied by -1.

Label: Economic resource index
Description: Economic resource index, combines poverty rate, public assistance rate, homeownership rate, high skill employment, and median household income, transformed to z-scores.
